name: One Punch Ball! (Summer Unreal Jam 2019)
description:
One Punch Bull was made for the 2019 Summer Unreal Jam.
Theme: "Make it Count"

Gameplay is Multiplayer, 3 or more players are recommended to enjoy the experience!

Discord Server to find people, support, say hi, etc:
https://discord.gg/UZUU4r

Team:
* Kiwi Argo
* Chernita
* VoidZero
* TadeoCore

Follow KiwiArgo Game development Stream!
https://www.twitch.tv/kiwiargo

How to Play / Rules

* Move with WASD

* Aim and shoot with Mouse

* Use Keys 1 to 6 to Display InGame Emojis
